title: JUDAS AND THE BLACK MESSIAH Ending Explained & Real Life History
author: Think Story
comment:
Wow, went the entire video not doing a Lady Gaga "Judas" meme.

Check out more of my Drama/History vids here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7geVqrZ0FiXBduR2SxRSajx
can we stop calling it a police raid. its was an assassination
He was 21 years old and they were afraid of him. That's greatness

I was in Chicago in those days.  I met Fred Hampton a couple times and heard him speak.  I haven't seen the movie yet but I get the impression it doesn't include the aftermath. Because of a bureaucratic screwup, the city didn't seal the building for two weeks and the Panthers took advantage and took about 15,000 people on tour through the apartment, including me, and it was terrifyingly obvious what had happened.

✊🏿you can kill a revolitionary but you cant kill the revolution
Fred hampton
description:
In this video we take a look at the real life characters, true story, and explain the ending to HBO Max and Warner Bros "Judas and the Black Messiah" starring Daniel Kaluuyah, LaKeith Stanfield, and Jesse Plemons.
